This is actually just shy of being canon.. Probably inspired by the bonus chapter where Asuna makes the arrangements to surprise Kirito by giving him the ENTIRE harem for like a year in Underworld on the condition that they keep their hands off him in the real world afterwards. 

Of course, both that and this were written long before they fucked up and retconned the movie (Ordinal Scale) into canon, so Asuna isn't fucking brain damaged here. >.>
